original_title: Daisy: The Story of a Facelift
overview: Middle-aged NFB producer Daisy Bellefeuille is about to get a facelift.  Rubbo follows the process through her discussions with her friends, consultations with physicians, observation of other facelift patients, and finally the operation and its aftermath.  There's also an amateur-intellectual sidebar on the history of physical appearance and its cultural importance- Altogether, a gripping, hour-long documentary about a woman and her facelift.
title: Daisy: The Story of a Facelift
